event.title: now part of the municipality of Trent Hills and makes up

data.event: Hastings is now part of the municipality of Trent Hills and makes up the second most substantial population centre in the municipality.

event.title: the 2003 municipal election and on October 27, 2014

data.event: Macmillan was first elected at the 2003 municipal election and on October 27, 2014, was re-elected for a fourth term.
In continuation of the street-scape design theme from the new Hastings Village Marina a Hastings Waterfront & Downtown Improvement Plan was prepared in early 2009.

event.title: 2009, after a four-year break, the local Chamber of Commerce was revived

data.event: In 2009, after a four-year break, the local Chamber of Commerce was revived.
